briefTitle: Evaluate the Maintenance of Effect After Long-term Treatment With Sativex速 in Subjects With Symptoms of Spasticity Due to Multiple Sclerosis
officialTitle: A Placebo Controlled, Parallel Group, Randomised Withdrawal Study of Subjects With Symptoms of Spasticity Due to Multiple Sclerosis Who Are Receiving Long-term Sativex速.
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the maintenance of effect after long-term treatment with Sativex速 in subjects with symptoms of spasticity due to Multiple Sclerosis (MS) who have been receiving long-term benefit from treatment with Sativex速.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Who Experience Treatment Failure.
